attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: hi i was here to tell you all to not get this app! this app brought wild animals to my house and attacked my cat, i am also here to tell you they gave my address to some homeless man and told him he could have it. I WAS ANGRY! so if you don’t wild animals come and attack you and your cat, or your house sold to a homeless person don’t get it.

attributes.title: Glitch
attributes.review: This app is all around poorly made. It glitches all the time and everything on the app has really poor quality. It makes me want to get my eyeballs removed from my head because of all the nasty pictures on there. Don’t get this horrible app

attributes.title: Waste of Software
attributes.review: i downloaded the app and it took 3 whole weeks. then when i opened it fro the first time, it crashed and deleted all of my apps off of my phone. i am really disappointed in the lack of consideration this app has for the rest on my phone space.

attributes.title: Terrible not worth it
attributes.review:
Crashed my phone. Had to reboot and delete the app. 
App tried to deport me to China.
Trump 2020 campaign is looking like a real mess so far, real sad. 
Performance for 2020 at an all time low. 
Get this man to a nursing home quick so he can retire, he’s worked so hard already. The man doesn’t need anymore stress.

attributes.title: No ❤️
attributes.review: Never using this again it kept glitching and I didn’t like that I, pretty sure a 5 year old can do better than this. Like what is this trump did you think that you where that important that you had to make a app about you? No think again Oompa Loompa ❤️

attributes.title: TERRIBLE 😝💅🏽🤩😻✨🔥😎
attributes.review: This app is so terrible! It’s so glitchy!!!! It made a bunch of trump 2020 flags show up on my front door!!! Since they were trump flags I decided to burn them but instead they set my dog on fire😔 he is in the hospital right now as I’m writing this😖 it makes so angry that this app set up my dog so he could burn instead of the flags😤😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: Worst App Ever Created
attributes.review: I can not believe the president of the USA would endorse something like this. Once I downloaded the app it gave my phone a virus...It stole all of my credit card information, my social security number, and my contacts. I don’t know how Donald Trump could do that to one of his own constituents. Disgusting!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!
attributes.review: Absolutely disgusted by this app not only is it radical right propaganda! But it is asking me to give MY PHONE NUMBER to some random guy in the “white house”. It’s ridiculous that they thought it was okay. I have been emotionally traumatized at the thought of this “president” having my number. Would not recommend AT ALL. #freebarontrump

attributes.title: my whole phone froze for a whole hour 😡
attributes.review: hey ladies and gents, karen here. you know i’m your average mom trying to use the technologies and whatnot nowadays, and ya know, i love me some president😂 but i was trying to download the app to support our lord and savior trump💞but my phone screen went black and froze and i asked my son bartholomew to help me fix it but he had no idea what to do 🤷🏻‍♀️ so i had to wait it out and it took almost a whole hour😿 silly me i must’ve done something wrong😂 oh well at least i got to drink wine and do puzzles while i waited😻🍷

attributes.title: Worst app ever 👁👄👁
attributes.review: I wanted to see what this whole app was about so I decided to download it. Next thing you know I see the big orange Cheeto puff on my screen and it made my whole phone go all UGLYYYYY and it made my phone screen crack like wow😔 Never again worst mistake ever to see that orange blob pop up in my screen smh.
